description:
Montreal, June 9, 2014 - Emiliy Irvine explains why she chose Python (and SciPy) for her neuroscience data analysis and how the Python community helped her.

Useful links:
* Emily: http://sflx.ca/emilyi
* SciPy: http://www.scipy.org/
* MP47: http://sflx.ca/mp47
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Why choose Python for neuroscience data analysis #MP47
